page.title: 18Living Near Wragby
page.content:
My name is Julie Allen and{I live {about 5km. from Wragby. My dad}has got a farm and{is self_employed.}Our house is halfway down a lane and at the end is my grandma's house.We do some shopping in Wragby,but{we have to {go to Lincoln or Horncastle for a lot {of things.
I like living in the country because it is peaceful,apart from a few tractors! We have got a lovely big garden and plenty of room to play in and we can go down to the beck to fish.
One disadvantage of living in the country is that we have to catch the school bus.The seats aren't very comfy and the journey takes a long time.
